headline: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (DRI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Darden Restaurants, Inc. on Stock Region Research’s Substack by Stock Region. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DRIz. Darden Restaurants, Inc.’s share was trading at $215.97 as of June 26th. DRIz’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.32 and 20.37 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Darden Restaurants […]
